title: [PS5] Sony Logon CSL 中獎通報區

replies.msg:
到目前為止～好似得sony 有人買到機
Logon 同CSL 無人中過

阿仔剛話我知我用佢個 email 登記嗰飛 Logon 中咗。

"Dear customer,
Warm greetings from LOG-ON.
Thank you for your registration and we are pleased to inform you that you have been selected to make a purchase for the chosen PlayStation®5 product. Please read carefully for the below payment process, terms & conditions and delivery arrangement."
